article: the united nations high commissioner for refugees -lrb- unhcr -rrb- has started official consultations with bhutanese refugees living in eastern nepal regarding their resettlement in the third country , the national news agency , rss reported on thursday .
abstract: un consulting bhutanese refugees in nepal over resettlement
